summary: "Saved by the Bell" is an American teen sitcom that first aired in 1989 on NBC. The show follows high school friends and their principal at Bayside High in Los Angeles. It started as a spin-off of "Good Morning, Miss Bliss." The series tackled lighthearted comedy and serious topics like drug use and homelessness. It starred Mark-Paul Gosselaar and Tiffani-Amber Thiessen, running for four seasons until 1993. It later spawned spin-offs and TV movies, and is considered one of the best school shows by AOL TV.
title: Saved by the Bell
